name: untilyouaresonude
text: Tina's that girl you went to high school with that blew all your friends for rides to the game.

name: molesticide
text:
my high school was small enough not to have one of those.

if it had, i might have gone to more games.

oh, who am i kidding, i went to them all, i was in the band.

name: ralnur
text: massive chubbies

name: tekende
text: Me too, all of this.

name: sleepyhead
text: tina's that girl with the pepperoni nipples that made you dislike pepperoni pizza for a little while

name: overmedicated
text: Chubbied for making me phyiscally ill.

name: carlyle
text: You totally just made me remember all this sick shit I saw on one of my porn trawls.

name: soticoto
text: You're makin me really hungry for pepperoni pizzas and rude titties.

name: lereya
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: jonbiedron
text: but not ever you

name: dtuba
text: DAMMIT I ruined the perfect 100 chubby's - forgive me everyone.

name: jamers
text: Beef's attempt to avoid confrontation in panel three cracks me up every time I read it.

name: red_rooster
text: A comment left by red_rooster was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CanusDivinus, Siah, smilebuddha)

name: ganymedeio
text: Psoriasis that I....... BONED?

name: rearadmiral
text: No.

name: soticoto
text: These knives?

name: catachresis
text: I love Molly's blog posts about how Tina has basically no class. You can see how she ended up with Ray.

name: semiquaver
text: He's one of the few men she knows in the crazy new world.  Still, she's pretty god damn clear about why she loves Beef later in the blog posts.  She really gets him.

name: overmedicated
text: Tina Tina Tina Tina Tina Tina Tina Tina Tina Tina

name: centipede_damascus
text: Tina is that person who thinks they are classy because they wear ten dollar sunglasses and way too much hairspray.

name: dorothypoopbot
text: Tina is that person who drives her gold-colored convertible badly because she can't hold onto the wheel with two-inch fingernails.

name: darthemed
text:
The words any man in a relationship dreads to hear:
" Can we talk? "

And because I hate generalizations, I feel I have to clarify that not every man in a relationship necessarily dreads those words.

name: stuart
text: For example: an exorbitantly priced professional in a doctor-patient relationship.

name: riazm
text: I personally think that not being able to say molecule is easily as good if not better than not being afraid of the police.

name: daaaaang
text: I rated this comic a five for this reason only

name: soticoto
text: Won't get you arrested so quick for one thing.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: The last panel kills me every time. I don't get why this is rated so low.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: the seventh panel is the one that kills me .

name: killingthejay
text: why has it not been photoshopped?  WHY?

name: rowboat
text: If Ray was ordering for me with that set of instructions, I'd have approximately four Jagers. If the word was "rural," I'd only need two.

name: i_love_kate
text:
If Ray can manage the umlaut, you can as well.

Jägermeisters.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Well, that backfired. What I was expecting there was for Assetbar to butcher the attempt at an accented vowel, ruining the gist of my admonition and setting me up for a second post in which I commended Rowboat's foresight.

Now I just feel like a bit of a pedant.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Wait, wait... what? I swear that God damn character showed up before.

It's like AssetBar is constantly devising new and inventive ways to fuck people over.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I always thought Molly would keep better company than Tina

name: killingthejay
text: finding roommates is hard in the bay area.

name: killingthejay
text: especially on a taco bell salary

name: greenkoolayd
text: applebees, doofie.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Tonight's party is gonna SUCK!
Roast Beef: Man what do you even do

name: nonentity
text: I love how this week, Ray invents a drink called the Wet Floor. I can imagine he was getting his Whopper on, saw the invariable yellow cone in front of the bathroom, and the wheels in his head just started spinning.

name: deusoma
text: Does Tina sound exactly like Ana Ortiz in anyone else's mind, or am I just crazy?

name: stereo
text: Did Tina just not realize it was that Roast Beef before now?

name: 7th_shot
text: Tina is a girl who notices things that directly affect her, and that's about it.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i used this 'molecule' rule this past new years. i got glances like i was a funny, intelligent guy and got hell of kisses out of it.

Thank you, Achewood.

name: terriblerobot
text: I've been using the "Drink until you don't feel feelings" rule for several years. It works, but the 'molecule' rule sounds more fun and less damaging to body and social status.

name: lawdog
text: Respectful disagreement with the alt-text: Gob's chicken dance is far superior to Kramer's.

name: mystkmanat
text: I was always partial to Lindsey's.

name: rasalghul
text: Chubbied the both of you since I did not know how to pronounce Gob until a few months ago.  Our ranks may only grow as time passes.

name: smaconi
text: CAW-ca-CAW

name: zem
text: i don't even care about the rest of the panels this is an instant 5 with ray's line

name: epicurus
text: You would actually have be to pretty fucking drunk to be conscious and not able to say molecule. You might get so grumpy and distracted that you refuse to say it, but to be literally unable to say it means you're probably about three hours from dying in a hospital.

name: zem
text: thanks for this much-needed analysis of an offhand line from ray

name: epicurus
text: No prob bro.

name: mangtastic
text:
Aw dang guys, don't be that way!

Hug and make up RIGHT NOW or else.

name: epicurus
text: He started it, mom!

name: crowrobot
text: wut
